snippet: Eric L. Adams, the Brooklyn borough president, suggests that tiny cameras be put on police officers’ weapons.
abstract: Letter from Brooklyn Borough Pres Eric L Adams comments on April 9 article on development of customized mobile apps that will aid users in documenting interactions with police, in light of shooting death of Walter L Scott in North Charleston, SC.
lead_paragraph: Eric L. Adams, the Brooklyn borough president, suggests that tiny cameras be put on police officers’ weapons.
